articles.title: US Domestic News Roundup: Legal Battles, Political Drama, and Corporate Sanctions
articles.description: A roundup of current US domestic news includes Boeing being sanctioned for revealing details of a 737 MAX investigation, the Supreme Court allowing emergency abortions in Idaho, upcoming Biden vs. Trump debate, Oklahoma mandating Bible teaching in schools, and new sanctions against Iran. Additional stories cover Uvalde police chief indictment and used cooking oil import concerns.

articles.title: CNN Faces Criticism Over Excluding White House Pool Reporters from Debate
articles.description: The White House Correspondents' Association criticized CNN for not including White House pool reporters in the studio during the first presidential debate between Joe Biden and Donald Trump.
